mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_likes (b_id, u_id, status) VALUE (#{bId}, #{uId}, #{status});
mapper.update: UPDATE board_likes SET status=#{status} WHERE u_id=#{uId} AND b_id=#{bId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board_likes WHERE u_id=#{uId} AND b_id=#{bId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN status='LIKE' THEN 1 END ) AS 'like', COUNT(CASE WHEN status='BAD' THEN 1 END ) AS 'bad', COUNT(CASE WHEN status='BEST' THEN 1 END ) AS 'best', COUNT(CASE WHEN status='SAD' THEN 1 END ) AS 'sad' FROM board_likes WHERE b_id=#{bId}
